Build Unix server

  1. Perform racking / cabling as required
  2. Secure hostnames ip addresses and firewall rules if required.
  3. Build the LPAR - Ignore in case of full blade, VMWare and standalone Wintel systems - They are already built by other teams.
    • Standard LPAR physical or virtual
    • A virtualized Blade LPAR
  4. Install the OS
    • IBM VIOS
    • IBM AIX
      • Perform Post installation Steps
    • Redhat Linux
      • Linux Post installation Steps
  5. Specific VIO and LPAR Documentation
    • taprvio140-141
    • taprvio90-91
    • peerdb99-original
    • peerdb99-mmd
    • vio20-21
    • paap3p01-mmd
    • tepr2e01-mmd
    • peerap99-mmd
    • power8-vio-cluster
